sentences: Igal inimesel on oma roll ühiskonnas.
context: In Estonian, 'igale' is the allative case form of 'iga', meaning 'each' or 'every'. The allative case indicates direction towards something. So 'igale' specifically means 'to each' or 'toward every one'. It's used when indicating that something applies to or should go toward each individual item in a group.
